name: Mage Kanade's Futanari Dungeon Quest
description:
Important: XUnity.AutoTranslator currently doesn't work with this game. Don't even try to use it, it might break your game.

Mage Kanade's Futanari Dungeon Quest is one of the newer dieselmine games featuring, surprisingly, the Mage Kanade who has been turned into a futa after getting caught by a succubus on a mission to slay a monster. She embarks on a mission to escape the cum-trap infested dungeon and find the succubus to turn herself back into her usual dick-less self. (Jesus christ...)

As Kanade, you escape/fight/dodge yourself through various levels and face a boss at the end of each. If Kanade gets defeated (indicated by the percentage counter), you'll see a game over H-scene.
